metadata.synopsis: The player approaches an altar dedicated to Shar. This altar is a call to action for the player to complete Shar's trials and become a Dark Justiciar.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Interact with the altar at -717; 3; -773 on SCL_Main_A

30.speaker: Shadowheart
30.text: We have all the gems - let's put them to use and continue onwards.

4.speaker: Shadowheart
4.text: We should be able to proceed now - the trials are all complete. Lady Shar's final task is near.

65.speaker: Shadowheart
65.text: There's nothing more for us to do here - not until we complete Lady Shar's trials.

67.speaker: Narrator
67.text: *Brave the Gauntlet of your Lady Shar. Surmount her trials, and rise a Dark Justiciar.*
67.context: NodeContext: The text of a plaque

27.speaker: Narrator
27.text: *A shiver of revulsion passes through you. Many enemies of the Moonmaiden must have been indoctrinated in this place.*

15.speaker: Narrator
15.text: *Your convictions have proven true. This is the Gauntlet of Lady Shar. Perhaps here, you can show yourself to be worthy. A Dark Justiciar, at last.*

60.speaker: Shadowheart
60.text: The Gauntlet of Shar.This place is legendary - even with half my memories locked away, I still remember the stories...

34.speaker: Shadowheart
34.text: The Gauntlet of Shar. This place is legendary - I surrendered most of my memories to help protect Shar's secrets, yet I still remember the stories of the Gauntlet...

40.speaker: Shadowheart
40.text: The Dark Lady's finest warriors arose from this place - and now I'm here.

32.speaker: Narrator
32.text: *There are recesses on the altar that look intended to house something. Another such receptacle already contains a gemstone.*

22.speaker: Player
22.text: Hold on - are you telling me you worship Shar, Shadowheart?

29.speaker: Shadowheart
29.text: Not the place or manner in which I thought you'd learn it, but yes - I worship the Dark Lady.

14.speaker: Shadowheart
14.text: I'm sorry I kept it from you. It's not a secret to be shared lightly.

10.speaker: Shadowheart
10.text: The Dark Justiciars were the Nightsinger's most trusted warriors - this is where they earned their place.

31.speaker: Shadowheart
31.text: In order to join Lady Shar's elite, you had to pass her trials, then make a sacrifice in her innermost sanctum - one revealed only when you've proven yourself. Very few made it that far.

36.speaker: Shadowheart
36.text: I've dreamed of this place. This is my destiny - I must complete the trials.
36.context: NodeContext: Determined. The chance of a lifetime has presented itself.

13.speaker: Player
13.text: You've been keeping secrets from me - is helping you in my best interest?

61.speaker: Shadowheart
61.text: We can discuss your hurt feelings later. If we want to make progress in this place, we have to do the trials.

69.speaker: Player
69.text: We're here to gain Ketheric Thorm's trust and uncover the Absolute's secrets - nothing more.

48.speaker: Player
48.text: This is a distraction. We need to stay focused on finding a cure.

6.speaker: Shadowheart
6.text: You don't understand - this will help free us from our infection.

52.speaker: Player
52.text: Are you sure this is what you want?

37.speaker: Shadowheart
37.text: You know me better than most - but I need to find out if I'm worthy.

35.speaker: Shadowheart
35.text: Yes. I've had some doubts in the past... but surely that's normal for such a monumentous step.

64.speaker: Shadowheart
64.text: Do you really need to ask? It's all I've ever wanted.

43.speaker: Player
43.text: What does becoming a Dark Justiciar mean?

26.speaker: Shadowheart
26.text: What does it mean? It means we'll have power - power we can use to take on the Absolute and rid ourselves of these parasites, once and for all.
26.context: NodeContext: Slightly surprised that the player doesn't recognise this as a Big Deal.

20.speaker: Shadowheart
20.text: If I become a Dark Justiciar, I'll have Lady Shar's highest blessing, and her arsenal at my disposal. This will be good for all of us. Let's explore.

41.speaker: Player
41.text: I've no intention of letting you prove your fanaticism to Shar.

57.speaker: Shadowheart
57.text: Don't worry, I won't sacrifice you. I think Lady Shar would want a more impressive offering.

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: If I prove myself to Lady Shar, she'll bless me with power - power we can use to take on the Absolute and rid ourselves of these parasites, once and for all. Let's explore.

63.speaker: Player
63.text: All right, I'll help if I can.

23.speaker: Shadowheart
23.text: Thank you. If I become a Dark Justiciar, I'll have Lady Shar's highest blessing, and her arsenal at my disposal. This will be good for all of us. Let's explore.

55.speaker: Shadowheart
55.text: Frankly I'm amazed you didn't work it out for yourself already. I'm not sure if that makes you highly respectful or deeply ignorant.

11.speaker: Player
11.text: Recall the contents of the book you found about Dark Justiciars.

21.speaker: Player
21.text: Search your memories. What do you know of the Dark Justiciars?

3.speaker: Player
3.text: Search your memories. Do you know anything of the Dark Justiciars?

58.speaker: Narrator
58.text: *You recall them being an inner circle of Shar followers - elite warriors, loyal to their last breath.*

45.speaker: Narrator
45.text: *The name seems familiar, but nothing comes to you.*

28.speaker: Player
28.text: Recall what you read before about the Trials of Shar.

49.speaker: Player
49.text: The trials of Lady Shar. Recall what they are - you must know, surely.

47.speaker: Player
47.text: The inscription spoke of the trials of Shar. Ask yourself what those could be.

16.speaker: Narrator
16.text: *Shar worshippers value traits like stealth, martial prowess, and navigating their goddess' darkness. The trials may test such skills.*

51.speaker: Narrator
51.text: *It seems they would complete their initiation with the blood sacrifice of a Selûnite.*

38.speaker: Narrator
38.text: *Your suspicions have proven true. This is the Gauntlet of Lady Shar. Perhaps here, you can show yourself to be worthy. A Dark Justiciar, at last.*

59.speaker: Narrator
59.text: *Your breath catches. The Gauntlet of Lady Shar - where her Dark Justiciars of old proved their mettle, through gruelling trial and sacrifice. Perhaps you can join their ranks.*
